verses.verse: Moreover,<WH5307> when you shall divide by lot the land<WH776> for inheritance,<WH5159> you shall offer<WH7311> an offering<WH8641> to Yahweh,<WH3068> a holy portion<WH6944> of the land;<WH776> the length<WH753> shall be the length<WH753> of twenty<WH6242> - five<WH2568> thousand<WH505> reeds,<WH7341> and the breadth shall be ten<WH6235> thousand:<WH505> it shall be holy<WH6944> in all its border<WH1366> all around.<WH5439>

and one<WH259> lamb<WH7716> of the flock,<WH6629> out of two hundred,<WH3967> from the well-watered<WH4945> pastures of Israel<WH3478>â€”for a meal offering,<WH4503> and for a burnt offering,<WH5930> and for peace offerings,<WH8002> to make atonement<WH3722> for them,<WH5002> says the Lord<WH136> Yahweh.<WH3069>

In the first<WH7223> month,<WH702> in the fourteenth day<WH3117> of the month,<WH2320> you shall have the Passover,<WH6453> a feast<WH2282> of seven<WH7620> days;<WH3117> unleavened bread<WH4682> shall be eaten.<WH398>

He shall prepare<WH6213> a meal offering,<WH4503> an ephah<WH374> for a bull,<WH6499> and an ephah<WH374> for a ram,<WH352> and a hin<WH1969> of oil<WH8081> to an ephah.<WH374>

In the seventh<WH7651> month,<WH2568> in the fifteenth day<WH3117> of the month,<WH2320> in the feast,<WH2282> shall he do<WH6213> the like the seven<WH7637> days;<WH3117> according to the sin offering,<WH2403> according to the burnt offering,<WH5930> and according to the meal offering,<WH4503> and according to the oil.<WH8081>
